formatted_address: 17 Old Airport Road, Kallang Estate, #01-16 Market, Singapore 397972
name: 148 Hot & Cold Drinks

reviews.text: I am always amazed by how long the queue is for this coffee stall and I decided to join the queue this time. The verdict is the coffee is awesome. The brewing of local coffee looks simple but somehow the outcome is never the same and hinges on many factors including TLC that is put into brewing the coffee. The coffee here has that nice coffee aroma and punch (and it is not a given as many places are just bitter and missing that coffee aroma). I read the toast and egg here is good which I will definitely be back to try them.

Served very good local coffee. Usually snake queue of people waiting patiently for their turn to order.

Today I try kopi Kosong to get a better taste of the coffee. Frankly, I would prefer to have it with sugar and or milk.

Still good lah, cause I can still drink it even without sugar.

80 cents for a cup of black coffee is very cheap already.
Longest queue in this small hawker centre. Fresh coffee brew and still reasonable. $1 for kopi. Most places are at least $1.30 onwards these days.

Best Coffee, best toast egg, best service award should go to this stall. Even with the inflation, this stall still maintain a reasonable price for the neighborhood. Kopi O kosong $0.8c where to find in SG. And kopi is thick not diluted for selling low.
Their coffee with tea($1.20) is smooth, smell nice and the ratio of coffee and tea is just nice. Slightly sweet. 9/10

vicinity: 17 Old Airport Road, Kallang Estate, #01-16 Market, Singapore
